content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    concat(month, '/', year) as "month/year", sum(cases) as "cases"
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result]
    group by year, month
    ORDER BY year, month
